metadata.title: DPM, Azeri FM discuss bilateral ties

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 25 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister, Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar Saturday held a telephone conversation with Azerbaijan's Foreign Minister Jeyhun Bayramov. They discussed the entire gamut of bilateral relations and exchanged views on regional and international developments. The two leaders also discussed the forthcoming visit of Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif to Azerbaijan.
